More than just a family outing

Improving an icon is an ambitious task, but at ŠKODA we never stand still. The new ŠKODA OCTAVIA Hatch retains its powerful yet elegant build with a new design and enhanced features to create a car that truly means business.

More than just a family car

The ŠKODA OCTAVIA has always offered an exceptional combination of style and versatility. In the new model we’ve taken that one step further, with new Simply Clever features and state of the art technology such as SmartLink and enhanced driver assistance systems. Combined with the unrivalled space and luxury you’ve come to expect from ŠKODA, the new OCTAVIA is both classically sophisticated and boldly ahead of the curve.

What makes the Kodiaq our winner are the neat touches that go the extra mile. It's simply a brilliant large SUV.

WhatCar? Best Large SUV

In its subtle ways the Kodiaq looks after you, as well as the ones you care for.

Top Gear Best Car for Big Families

Seating seven in style and comfort at a remarkably easy to swallow cost, the Škoda Kodiaq is an SUV that scores on so many levels.

Parkers Best Seven Seater

The Kodiaq is a brilliantly thought-through, well-executed product

Top Gear Family SUV of the Year 2017
